Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Oceancrest Avenue, behind a large shopping complex.
Room.LongDescription: The large shopping complex on the north side of the road cannot be entered from this side of the building. The entrance must be on the other side, off of Hillborough Way. On the south side of the road, you can see the large Bushman Farms estate, where all kinds of fruits and vegetables are grown.
